snippet.title: Packin' Plax Klax Tetris style block puzzle game raw footage
snippet.description:
Download: http://m3dr.com/projects/packin_plax/index.html 

Developed for Caiman's 2006 "Total Packaging Supplier" competition, the objective was to create a game involving packaging machines.  I decided to bsae my game on the classic, Klax.  

In the game, you have to create packages of matching colors (3 or more per package) as they move down the conveyor belt.  This version features power-ups and hazards, a multitude of different colored blocks (depending on how far you get) and more.

Packin' Plax placed 2nd in the competition (0.1 points away from 1st) and was named the "Freeware Game of the Month" in January 2007's PC Zone magazine!
